00036 
00037 void LaGrassProcessLib::analyseModel(QString theRasterMask, int theAreaTarget)
00038 {
00039 
00040     // get the area targets
00041 
00042 
00043       //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  ///
00044      // Make Cost Surface   //
00045     //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  ///
00046 
00047     // r.mapcalc "TimeOnlyFrictionMap=if(isnull(DEM), null(), 1)"
00048     // r.walk max_cost=20000 elevation=dem_patched_filled@PERMANENT friction=theFrictionMap output=rwalkResultsSlopeMax20kFMap coordinate=744800,3611100 percent_memory=100 nseg=4 walk_coeff=0.72,6.0,1.9998,-1.9998 lambda=0 slope_factor=-0.2125 -k
00049 
00050 
00051       //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //
00052      // find the land!   //
00053     //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //
00054 
00055     // binary search used
00056      // function:
00057      //   Searches sortedArray[first]..sortedArray[last] for key.
00058      // returns: index of the matching element if it finds key,
00059      //         otherwise  -(index where it could be inserted)-1.
00060      // parameters:
00061      //   sortedArray in  array of sorted (ascending) values.
00062      //   first, last in  lower and upper subscript bounds
00063      //   key         in  value to search for.
00064      // returns:
00065      //   index of key, or -insertion_position -1 if key is not
00066      //                 in the array. This value can easily be
00067      //                 transformed into the position to insert it.
00068    int myFirst = 0;
00069    int myLast=18000;
00070    int myAreaTarget = 1;   // change this to real value
00071    
00072    LandFound mySearchStatus = NotEnough;
00073    int myCurrentlyContainedArea = 0;
00074 
00075    while (myFirst <= myLast)
00076   {
00077     int myMid = (myFirst + myLast) / 2;    // compute mid point.
00078       // reclass with 1 to midpoint and null beyond and then check results
00079       //    echo "0 thru $step = 1" | r.reclass input=$cost output=cost.reclass --o
00080       //    r.stats -n -a fs=- input=cost.reclass > $TMP1
00081 
00082       // find out if the contained area is within acceptable range
00083     mySearchStatus = getSearchStatus(myCurrentlyContainedArea, myAreaTarget);
00084 
00085     switch (mySearchStatus)
00086     {
00087       case NotEnough:
00088             myFirst = myMid + 1;    // repeat search in top half.
00089             break;;
00090       case TooMuch:
00091             myLast = myMid - 1;   // repeat search in bottom half.
00092             break;
00093       case FoundTarget:
00094               // found it. break out of loop   //  ///
00095             myFirst = myLast+1;
00096             break;
00097     }
00098 
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00102 LandFound LaGrassProcessLib::getSearchStatus(int theCurrentlyContainedArea, int theAreaTarget)
00103 {
00104   LandFound myStatus;
00105   int myPrecision=5;    //get the real value for precision
00106   float myAcceptableRange=(theAreaTarget*myPrecision*0.01)/2.0;
00107   float myMinimumAcceptable = theAreaTarget - myAcceptableRange;
00108   float myMaximumAcceptable = theAreaTarget + myAcceptableRange;
00109 
00110   if (theCurrentlyContainedArea >= myMinimumAcceptable)
00111     {      myStatus = (theCurrentlyContainedArea <= myMaximumAcceptable) ? FoundTarget : TooMuch;    }
00112   else
00113     {
00114       myStatus = NotEnough;
00115     }
00116 
00117   return myStatus;
00118 }
